cards.name: Rapid Loadout
cards.rulesText: Swap your hand with 3 new cards, then move 1 space.

cards.name: Shotgun Blitz
cards.rulesText: Deal 4 damage to a character within 1 space.

cards.name: Rifle Sweep
cards.rulesText: Deal 2 damage to up to 2 characters in a straight line.

cards.name: Low Blow
cards.rulesText: Deal 3 damage and force the opponent to discard 1 card.

cards.name: Cheap Shot
cards.rulesText: Deal 2 damage and push the target 1 space.

cards.name: Makeshift Trap
cards.rulesText: Target discards 1 card or takes 3 damage; your choice.

cards.name: Wanted Dead
cards.rulesText: Mark an enemy; when they take damage, they take +1 more until your next turn.

cards.name: Sucker Punch
cards.rulesText: Move 3 spaces and deal 2 damage to an adjacent character.

cards.name: Scrappy Brawler
cards.rulesText: Draw 1, move 1, then deal 1 damage to a nearby enemy.

cards.name: Guns Blazing
cards.rulesText: Discard 2 cards to deal 5 damage divided among enemies in range.

cards.name: Booby Trap
cards.rulesText: Next time any character moves adjacent, they take 3 damage.

cards.name: Retaliate
cards.rulesText: After being attacked, move 2 spaces and deal 2 damage back.

cards.name: Tactical Overdrive
cards.rulesText: Draw 2 cards, move 3 spaces, and deal 4 damage split among enemies.

cards.name: Battle-Hardened
cards.rulesText: Heal 2, then push up to 2 adjacent enemies 1 space away.
